title: Designing Personalized Mathematics Curriculum Through Analysis of Factors Influencing Learning Motivation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical knowledge and work application experience
context.additional_context: Implementing real-case-based simulations to strengthen workplace relevance for current industry professionals

learning_goals: Analyze five motivational change factors (organizational, psychological, communicative, goal-oriented, and effectiveness factors) and incorporate them into instructional design
Learners can revise three or more components of the educational curriculum based on survey data
Learners can diagnose demotivation scenarios and propose improvement strategies using VR simulations
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
